data: Just two weeks before the S. S. Herringbone of the Interstellar Exploration, Examination (and Exploitation) Service was due to start her return journey to Earth, one of her scouts disconcertingly reported the discovery of intelligent life in the Virago System.
S. S. Herringbone | Interstellar Exploration, Examination (and Exploitation) Service | Earth | Virago System

Just two weeks before the _S. S. Herringbone_ of the Interstellar Exploration, Examination (and Exploitation) Service was due to start her return journey to Earth, one of her scouts disconcertingly reported the discovery of intelligent life in the Virago System.
Smith, Evelyn E., 1922-2000; Dillon, Diane, 1933- [Illustrator]; Dillon, Leo, 1933-2012 [Illustrator]
